original_title: 99x strengthens leadership team with key management additions and transitions
original_body_lines: 99x, a leading product engineering company, is pleased to announce significant additions and changes to its management team as part of its dynamic “Resetting and Rebuilding” theme for the year 2023, targeting corporate goals.

To strengthen capabilities and foster innovation, 99x is proud to announce the new designations for several key members of its management team. Among the leaders set to take up strategic roles and drive the company to new heights of success are: Hasith Yaggahavita, appointed to the role of Chief Engineering & Innovation Officer, Sachith Perera, stepping into the position of Chief Technology Officer, Suren Rodrigo, leading the product engineering efforts as Chief Product Officer, Chatura De Silva as Chief Customer Success Officer, Buddhinatha Wijewantha, taking the helm as Chief Delivery Officer, and Kalana Wijesekera bringing his expertise as Chief Developer Experience Officer.

Additionally, we extend a warm welcome to accomplished individuals joining the management team, acknowledging their outstanding contributions to the company’s growth and success. Tharindra Jayamaha joins as Director – Product Quality, bringing invaluable talent and dedication refined over 9 years at 99x, including receiving the coveted CEO’s award in 2021 and playing a pivotal role in numerous customer projects and corporate initiatives. Anura Adhikari joins as Senior Manager – Employee Success, bringing 16 years of experience in a number of leadership roles. His impressive track record includes product development at the StartupX Foundry and a key role in enhancing the company’s brand within universities and nurturing future talent within the Dotitude initiative. Samra Aman joins as Senior Manager – Delivery, leveraging 8 years of experience and a remarkable career path that has contributed to outstanding project delivery across multiple customer engagements.
